thread.title: Watch Adeles Mournful Video for New Song Hello
thread.title_full: Watch Adeles Mournful Video for New Song Hello

title: Watch Adeles Mournful Video for New Song Hello
text:
Watch Adele's Mournful Video for New Song 'Hello' 
Rolling Stone Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Directed by Xavier Dolan, "Hello" was shot in Montreal's countryside and finds the singer in the immediate aftermath of a messy breakup. After losing a signal while talking to her ex on the phone, Adele enters a dusty, old house to try and make sense of a chaotic, still-fresh romantic wound. 
The video mirrors the elegiac track, which finds Adele singing, "Hello, it's me/I was wondering if after all these years, you'd like to meet/To go over everything/ They say that time's supposed to heal you/But I ain't done much healing" over a minimalist ballad. 
"This song was a massive breakthrou...
